bpuzon wrote:
> 
> All my tests are derived from an abstract class with @BeforeClass. And
> @BeforeClass is still being run more than once for testing process :/ (I'm
> asking Eclipse to run MasterTest()).
> 

Of course, @BeforeClass methods should be defined in Suite class, NOT in my
abstract class.
